patch:
@@ -128,7 +128,7 @@ recoveryAuth$Ref=Recovery authentication data reference
 recoveryAuth.desc=Authentication data for transaction recovery.
 
 stmtCacheSz=Cached statements per connection
-stmtCacheSz.desc=Maximum number of cached statements per connection. If updated while the server is running, the statement cache is resized upon next use.
+stmtCacheSz.desc=Maximum number of cached statements per connection. If updated while the server is running, the statement cache is resized upon next use. To set this option, complete the following prerequisites: Review either the application code or an SQL trace that you gather from the database or database driver for all unique prepared statements. Ensure that the cache size is larger than the number of statements.
 
 syncQryTx=Synchronize query and transaction timeouts
 syncQryTx.desc=Use the time remaining (if any) in a JTA transaction as the default query timeout for SQL statements.
@@ -150,7 +150,7 @@ properties.desc=List of JDBC vendor properties for the data source. For example,
 properties.datadirect.sqlserver=DataDirect Connect for JDBC (sqlserver) Properties
 properties.datadirect.sqlserver.desc=Data source properties for the DataDirect Connect for JDBC driver for Microsoft SQL Server.
 
-properties.db2.i.native=DB2 for i Native JDBC Driver Properties 
+properties.db2.i.native=DB2 for i Native JDBC Driver Properties
 properties.db2.i.native.desc=Data source properties for the IBM DB2 for i Native JDBC driver.
 
 properties.db2.i.toolbox=DB2 for i Toolbox JDBC Driver Properties
@@ -428,7 +428,7 @@ driverType.4.desc=Type 4 JDBC driver.
 enableAlternateGroupSeamlessACR=Enable alternate group seamless ACR
 enableAlternateGroupSeamlessACR.desc=JDBC driver property: enableAlternateGroupSeamlessACR.
 enableBidiLayoutTransformation=Enable bidirectional layout transformation
-enableBidiLayoutTransformation.desc=JDBC driver property: enableBidiLayoutTransformation. 
+enableBidiLayoutTransformation.desc=JDBC driver property: enableBidiLayoutTransformation.
 enableBulkLoad=Enable bulk load
 enableBulkLoad.desc=JDBC driver property: enableBulkLoad.
 enableCancelTimeout=Enable cancel timeout
@@ -547,7 +547,7 @@ ifxFET_BUF_SIZE=Fetch buffer size
 ifxFET_BUF_SIZE.desc=JDBC driver property: ifxFET_BUF_SIZE.
 ifxGL_DATE=DATE end-user formats
 ifxGL_DATE.desc=JDBC driver property: ifxGL_DATE.
-ifxGL_DATETIME=DATETIME end-user formats 
+ifxGL_DATETIME=DATETIME end-user formats
 ifxGL_DATETIME.desc=JDBC driver property: ifxGL_DATETIME.
 ifxIFX_AUTOFREE=Enable automatic free feature
 ifxIFX_AUTOFREE.desc=JDBC driver property: ifxIFX_AUTOFREE.
@@ -1061,7 +1061,7 @@ useIdentityValLocalForAutoGeneratedKeys.desc=JDBC driver property: useIdentityVa
 useJDBC4ColumnNameAndLabelSemantics=Use JDBC 4 column name and label semantics
 useJDBC4ColumnNameAndLabelSemantics.desc=JDBC driver property: useJDBC4ColumnNameAndLabelSemantics. Values are: 1 (YES) or 2 (NO).
 useJDBC41DefinitionForGetColumns=Use JDBC 4.1 definition for get columns
-useJDBC41DefinitionForGetColumns.desc=JDBC driver property: useJDBC41DefinitionForGetColumns. 
+useJDBC41DefinitionForGetColumns.desc=JDBC driver property: useJDBC41DefinitionForGetColumns.
 user=User
 user.desc=It is recommended to use a container managed authentication alias instead of configuring this property.
 useRowsetCursor=Use rowset cursor
@@ -1091,4 +1091,4 @@ XMLDescribeType.desc=JDBC driver property: XMLDescribeType.
 xmlFormat=XML format
 xmlFormat.desc=JDBC driver property: xmlFormat.
 xopenStates=X/Open compliant SQL states
-xopenStates.desc=JDBC driver property: xopenStates.
\ No newline at end of file
+xopenStates.desc=JDBC driver property: xopenStates.
